participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, Emily finds joy in caring for others and values her family deeply.
participant_1.background: my favorite way to relax is to read a book. i walk three miles every day. i'm a baby delivery nurse. i love to spend time with my family.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, Carlos is passionate about music and enjoys exploring new cultures through language.
participant_2.background: one of the languages that i'm currently studying is spanish. i am a musician. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. i also study languages. my next language to study is french.
